pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [c44a752ad5](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/19067/commits/c44a752ad54df2f97748b932c570bc7f065236e5)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.Kaehler.JacobiZariski`|1342|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ Cotangent.exact`
`+ Cotangent.map_ofComp_ker`
`+ Cotangent.surjective_map_ofComp`
`+ CotangentSpace.compCotangentSpace`
`+ CotangentSpace.compCotangentSpace_symm_inr`
`+ CotangentSpace.compCotangentSpace_symm_zero`
`+ CotangentSpace.exact`
`+ CotangentSpace.fst_compCotangentSpace`
`+ CotangentSpace.fst_compCotangentSpace_apply`
`+ CotangentSpace.map_ofComp_surjective`
`+ CotangentSpace.map_toComp_injective`
`+ H1Cotangent.exact_map_δ'`
`+ H1Cotangent.δAux`
`+ H1Cotangent.δAux_C`
`+ H1Cotangent.δAux_X`
`+ H1Cotangent.δAux_monomial`
`+ H1Cotangent.δAux_mul`
`+ H1Cotangent.δAux_ofComp`
`+ H1Cotangent.δAux_toAlgHom`
`+ H1Cotangent.δ_comp_equiv`
`+ H1Cotangent.δ_eq`
`+ H1Cotangent.δ_eq_δ`
`+ H1Cotangent.δ_eq_δAux`
`+ H1Cotangent.δ_map`
`+ kerCompPreimage`
`+ map_toComp_ker`
`+ ofComp_kerCompPreimage`
`+ ofComp_toAlgHom_monomial_sumElim`
`+ toComp_toAlgHom`
`++ H1Cotangent.exact_map_δ`
`++ H1Cotangent.exact_δ_map`
`++ H1Cotangent.δ`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>Increase in tech debt: 2.00</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|1559|2|erw|

Current commit [c44a752ad5](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/c44a752ad54df2f97748b932c570bc7f065236e5)
Reference commit [e69ec59a36](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/e69ec59a3621ca8bc3cb3d0ab37c9a9c5695cb47)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
</details>

Unfortunately this PR is quite big but it is mainly boring calculation with little interesting result except for the last three lemmas.
If this is still hard to review I can split it arbitrarily in half.
I think these 5 maps should be `map`, `δ`, `mapBaseChange`, `map`, `map` respectively? And maybe the lemma `exact_δ_map` should be named `exact_δ_mapBaseChange`?
Is this needed because you can't provide a term directly?

pullRequest.title: feat(RingTheory): Jacobi-Zariski sequence
